Description: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) announced a settlement with recreational vehicle manufacturer, American Suzuki Motor Corporation and Suzuki Motor Corporation, to pay an $885,000 penalty for allegedly importing and selling 25,458 uncertified all-terrain vehicles (ATVs) and off-road motorcycles in the United States.
American Suzuki Motor Corp. agreed to pay $540,000 in restitution and costs in settlement of allegations a former Suzuki dealer used deceptive advertisements concerning financing.

Company: American Suzuki Motor Corporation& Suzuki Motor Corporation

Description: Suzuki agreed to a settlement worth an estimated $5 million to resolve class action litigation concerning motorcycle design defects.
Private Litigation Case Title: David v. American Suzuki Motor Corporation et al
